capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm Flitwick, and I must say that being a professor is truly my passion. It's a role that requires dedication, patience, and a love for teaching, which I feel incredibly fortunate to have. The mantra of "Draco dormiens nunquam titillandus" - or "Never tickle a sleeping dragon" - has always resonated with me, as it reminds us to approach our students with care and respect, even when they may be feeling restless or challenging.
